member.name: T:Leadtools.Annotations.BatesStamp.AnnBatesStampComposer
member.summary: AnnBatesStampComposer is the main part for Bates stamping operation as it connects annotations containers with Bates stamp objects.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Annotations.BatesStamp.AnnBatesStampComposer.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new AnnBatesStampComposer class object with default values.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Annotations.BatesStamp.AnnBatesStampComposer.Load(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Loads a Bates stamp composer from the specified stream.
member.param: File containing the XML data of the Bates stamp composer to be loaded. This value must not be **null**.
member.returns: A new AnnBatesStampComposer object containing all the Bates stamp objects and elements loaded from \stream\.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Annotations.BatesStamp.AnnBatesStampComposer.Load(System.String)
member.summary: Loads a Bates stamp composer from the specified file.
member.param: File containing the XML data of the Bates stamp composer to be loaded. This value must not be **null**.
member.returns: A new AnnBatesStampComposer object containing all the Bates stamp objects and elements loaded from \fileName\.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Annotations.BatesStamp.AnnBatesStampComposer.LoadFromString(System.String)
member.summary: Loads a Bates stamp composer from a string.
member.param: string containing the XML data of the Bates stamp composer to be loaded. This value must not be **null**.
member.returns: A new AnnBatesStampComposer object containing all the Bates stamp objects and elements loaded from \xmlData\.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Annotations.BatesStamp.AnnBatesStampComposer.Save(System.IO.Stream,Leadtools.Annotations.BatesStamp.AnnBatesStampComposer)
member.summary: Saves a Bates stamp composer with its components to a stream.
member.param: Destination stream to save the data to.
The AnnBatesStampComposer to be saved. This value must not be **null**.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Annotations.BatesStamp.AnnBatesStampComposer.Save(System.String,Leadtools.Annotations.BatesStamp.AnnBatesStampComposer)
member.summary: Saves a Bates stamp composer with its components to a file.
member.param: Destination file name to save the data to.
The AnnBatesStampComposer to be saved. This value must not be **null**.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Annotations.BatesStamp.AnnBatesStampComposer.SaveToString(Leadtools.Annotations.BatesStamp.AnnBatesStampComposer)
member.summary: Saves a Bates stamp composer to a string.
member.param: The AnnBatesStampComposer to be saved. This value must not be **null**.

member.summary: Free the resource used by AnnBatesStampComposer object and detach the events .

member.summary: Releases all the resources used by this AnnBatesStampComposer.

member.summary: Defines a logo that can be drawn for the Bates stamp components.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of this class.

member.summary: Creates an exact copy of this AnnBatesStampLogo object.
member.returns: The AnnBatesStampLogo object that this class creates.

member.summary: Raises the PropertyChanged event.
member.param: AnnPropertyChangedEventArgs event data

member.name: E:Leadtools.Annotations.BatesStamp.AnnBatesStampLogo.PropertyChanged
member.summary: Occurs when a property value changes. AnnPropertyChangedEventArgs

member.name: P:Leadtools.Annotations.BatesStamp.AnnBatesStampLogo.Angle
member.summary: Gets or sets the angle of the logo.
member.value: The angle of the logo.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Annotations.BatesStamp.AnnBatesStampLogo.Font
member.summary: Gets or sets the font of the logo's text.
member.value: The font of the logo's text

member.name: P:Leadtools.Annotations.BatesStamp.AnnBatesStampLogo.LogoRect
member.summary: Gets or sets the LeadRectD of the logo picture and its text.
member.value: The rectangle of the logo picture and its text where they will be laid out.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Annotations.BatesStamp.AnnBatesStampLogo.Opacity
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the opacity value to use when drawing the Bates stamp logo.
member.value: A value indicating the opacity value to use when drawing the Bates stamp logo. A value of 1 means opaque and a value of 0 means transparent. Allowable values are between 0 and 1 inclusive. The default value is 1.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Annotations.BatesStamp.AnnBatesStampLogo.Picture
member.summary: Gets or sets a picture for the logo.
member.value: The picture of the logo.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Annotations.BatesStamp.AnnBatesStampLogo.StretchLogo
member.summary: Gets or sets the stretch property to the Bates stamp logo. Hence, making it possible to cover the entire area of the container attached to this Bates stamp.
member.value: The value that determines whether or not to stretch the Bates stamp logo to the entire container area attached to this Bates stamp.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Annotations.BatesStamp.AnnBatesStampLogo.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the text of the logo.
member.value: The text of the logo.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Annotations.BatesStamp.AnnBatesStampTranslator
member.summary: AnnBatesStampTranslator defines a translator that converts the Bates stamp elements to a string expression. Converts from a string expression to Bates stamp elements that can be saved and loaded using AnnBatesStampComposer.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Annotations.BatesStamp.AnnBatesStampTranslator.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of this class.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Annotations.BatesStamp.AnnBatesStampTranslator.ReadFromString(System.String)
member.summary: Reads all Bates stamp elements from the elements' text expression.
member.param: A string containing the text expression to be read from the Bates stamp elements. This value must not be **null**.
member.returns: An array of IAnnBatesElement objects.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Annotations.BatesStamp.AnnBatesStampTranslator.WriteElementsToString(Leadtools.Annotations.BatesStamp.IAnnBatesElement[])
member.summary: Converts an array of IAnnBatesElement elements to a string expression using (starting, ending , and separating) symbols.
member.param: The Bates stamp elements array to convert to a string expression. This value must not be **null**.
member.returns: A string expression for these \elements\.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Annotations.BatesStamp.AnnBatesStampTranslator.WriteElementToString(Leadtools.Annotations.BatesStamp.IAnnBatesElement)
member.summary: Converts IAnnBatesElement to string expression using (starting, ending, and separating) symbols.
member.param: The Bates stamp element to convert to a string expression. This value must not be **null**.
member.returns: A string expression for this \element\.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Annotations.BatesStamp.AnnBatesStampTranslator.ExpressionEndSymbol
member.summary: Gets or sets the expression's ending symbol.
member.value: A value of the ending symbol for the given expression. The default value is **"}}"**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Annotations.BatesStamp.AnnBatesStampTranslator.ExpressionSeparatingSymbol
member.summary: Gets or sets the separating symbol for the given expression.
member.value: A value for the given expression that separates the Bates stamp element properties. The default value is **"\*"**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Annotations.BatesStamp.AnnBatesStampTranslator.ExpressionStartSymbol
member.summary: Gets or sets the starting symbol the expression should start with.
member.value: A value of the starting symbol the expression should start with, the default value is **"{{"**.
